findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows minting an unlimited number of sundae tokens without any restriction or cap.

findings.title: Constructor
findings.description: The constructor function has public visibility and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.description: The transfer function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.description: The approve function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: transferFrom

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap functions, which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in skim function.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any access modifiers or reentrancy protection which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected and can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: increaseAllowance
findings.description: The _increase function allows an arbitrary increase of allowance without proper validation, potentially leading to unauthorized access and asset manipulation.

findings.title: Decrease Allowance Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in decreaseAllowance function.

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function does not prevent an excluded address from receiving rewards.

findings.title: excludeFromFee

findings.title: includeInFee

findings.title: setTaxFeePercent
findings.description: External function setTaxFeePercent has onlyOwner access control, allowing the owner to set tax fee percentage.
